channel.title: 2 Question i bneed answered!
channel.description:
Ok first question...
how can i edit what items the shops sell to make them sell dragon items and stuff?
second. how can i stop 1hit killing all my spawned monsters?
thank you

item.title: 2 Question i bneed answered!
item.dc:creator: @kiddryan77 kiddryan77
item.description:
@kiddryan77 wrote:

Ok, to edit what items are in the shops, go to shops.cfg, then edit what shop maker you want to have your item. First put the item code like lets say 1000 then put how many you want him to be selling like 100. And when you space, dont hit the space bar always use the tab key or it WILL NOT WORK. Ok, for the prices…Go to item.cfg, you will see the item code, let me show you…item = 1149 Dragon_med_helm Makes_the_wearer_pretty_intimidating. 61608.0013642381 61608.0013642381 500000 0 0 0 -3 -1 33 35 32 -1 34 10 0
Ok see the first 61608, that is how much you alch it for…Now look at the 2nd one. Edit that one for the shops price you want. Need any help idk just get ahold of me somehow…And dont forget to compile!

Read full topic
